backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing WhatsApp form‑submission requirements and associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto‑generated one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling navigation between questionnaire, completion, and contact views with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/AxisMaxLifeHeade: Sticky header with logo navigation and a Contact Us button highlighting when active.
frontend/src/components/CompletionScreen: Displays completion stats, results summary, and navigation to contact or restart.
frontend/src/components/ContactUsPage.ts: Contact form collecting user details and triggering WhatsApp URL creation with fallback UI if auto‑open fails.
frontend/src/components/HeroBanner.tsx: Renders a styled hero banner with title, subtitle, optional description, and decorative animations.
frontend/src/components/QuestionnaireFlo: Controls questionnaire progression, tracks answers, shows progress UI, and triggers a popup when 60% yes answers are reached.
frontend/src/components/ResultsSummary.t: Displays a summary of all questions with yes/no indicators in both English and Hindi.
frontend/src/components/YesSixtyPopup.ts: Shows a congratulatory dialog when the user reaches the 60% yes threshold, prompting them to continue.
frontend/src/content/questions.axisMaxLi: Defines and exports the full list of English and Hindi questionnaire questions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionnaireSessi: Manages questionnaire answers and popup state with localStorage persistence and reset capability.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark mode palettes and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Provides helpers to build a wa.me URL with pre-filled contact data and open it in a new browser tab.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, shadows, and OKLCH-driven theme variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements and issues, focusing on fixing the contact form to open WhatsApp with pre-filled user details.
